summary:
Actively pursuing new challenges 

Having made a transition from Albania/Kosovo to the EU Netherlands now, I am actively engaged in pursuing my next career move.  My extensive background in working for state and local governmental entities, as well as NGOs, gives me a solid basis and skillset that can be applied in a variety of roles.    

The Western Balkans, synonymous with turmoil, is where I have built a career spanning over two decades.  My primary roles have involved fostering governance and democratization within this highly volatile region. It goes without saying, that success within the Balkans requires a broad skillset to work in difficult, stressful and tense situations.  Over the years, I have honed my skills, which directly contributed to the success of my endeavors and earned the respect among professionals peers and not only.

My unique professional experience and background gives me a worldly perspective that I look forward to sharing in my next role.  By nature, I am motivated, enthusiastic, proactive, communicative, and more importantly, ethical.  I love to learn and do not shy away from any challenge.  I pursue all that I do with passion, dedication and commitment to the ultimate end goal.  

I am currently looking for a position that enables me to relay the professional experience but certainly enabling me to learn from the work I will be doing as I truly believe that every job is a stepping stone to career learning and further professional development. 
 
I look forward to speaking further and can be contacted at:

Cell:  +31 65 13 00 841
https://www.linkedin.com/in/isakbilalli/ 
isak.bilalli@hotmail.com 
isaactiral@gmail.com 

Sincerely,

Isak N. Bilalli

company.name: Embassy of United States in Kosovo

profile_positions.company: Embassy of United States in Kosovo
profile_positions.description:
Provided regular analytical reporting on minority return related issues (political and programmatic) missing persons issue and other emerging issues.
Monitored and reported on the trends of returns and or departures – new developments on the returns issue and correspondents to urgent security crises related to returns/IDP’s.
Advised the Political Section on returns related issues 
Reported regularly on IDP’s and refugee return related issues in Kosovo, Serbia and Montenegro, Macedonia with a focus on programmatic developments and needs
Coordinated with the Front Office and Public Diplomacy Section regarding issues and the political climate affecting the return process and reintegration process. 
Followed and monitored the work of Ministry of Communities and Returns, UNMIK programs on returns and reports Embassy and Washington on the developments on the ground 
gathered data and compiled (partial)  Annual Human Rights Report 
Represented Embassy at various meetings with International and Local Organizations 
Supported and organized independently the VIP visits to returns sites. Acted as an interpreter and escort for visiting officials, arranges travel itineraries and provides related logistics
Followed the political atmosphere in regards to returns and IDP’s in Serbia
profile_positions.title: Foreign Service National FSN, Political Assistant

Designed and developed  Municipal Strategy  on developing Citizens Services Center (one-stop-shop) for target Municipalities

Facilitated process and contributed remarkably for compiling the annual work-plan of the organization

Interpreting and translating according to the needs of the organization
profile_positions.title: National Program Officer

profile_positions.location: USAID’s Local Government Initiative - Gjilan/Gnjlane, Kosovo
profile_positions.description:
Advised Municipal Assembly President, Vice President, and Chief Executive Officer on Leadership and Management Issues at the Municipal level of the Government
provided advice and expertise to municipal officials and civil society in improving local governance and  taking advantage of donor training and funding
Administered USAID Incentive fund allocated to the Municipality of Gjilanfor provision of additional technical assistance in promoting and facilitating the achievement of key reforms, policy initiatives, procedures or other good governance objectives.
Assisted municipal officials in solving the most pressing problems facing the municipalities
Collaborated with citizens and citizen groups in reaching greater participation in decision-making at the local level, greater transparency in local governance and more accountability of local officials
Assisted officials in exercising their authority to the maximum extent permitted under law and helping to keep them abreast of new or modified legislation
Assisted in the necessary follow-through when central level reforms and legislation are adopted and implemented the execution of laws needed to take place at the local level.
profile_positions.title: Resident Municipal Advisor

profile_positions.location: USAID’s Local Government Initiative  Gjilan/Gnjilane Kosovo
profile_positions.description:

Supporting the Resident Municipal Advisor in any roll out of the LGI program to other Municipalities
Support to the Resident Municipal Advisor in the training/capacity building programs. 
Facilitated on job training/ capacity building program designed for Municipal needs to CSC staff.
profile_positions.title: Municipal Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:

Identified Infrastructure Projects with the highest impact on community life improvement 
Assisted municipal governments to establish municipal priorities, and to engage local communities in participatory decision-making, and strengthen moderate voices of leadership within the community.

Monitored the jurisdiction process in Municipality, special emphasis monitoring court trials related to cases of interethnic violence/crime.
Supported the Local NGOs in their program activities and capacity building
Developed and compiled the updating Biweekly reports, meeting data sheets and notes of meetings

volunteer_experiences.role: Promotion of friendship ties Kosovo Isreal

company.name: Kosovo Isreal Friendship Association HAIM ABRAVANEL

volunteer_experiences.description:
promotional activities, representing and highlighting friendship values and mission objective of the organization and relaying these values to International activities, conferences and events in the region and overseas. 
Specific Contribution
Provided assistance in implementing variety of activities to promote friendship ties between Kosovo and Israel. 
Assistance in identifying and exploring evidences for Kosovar families that rescued Jews during Holocaust. 
Attended and facilitated preparations for International Conferences that related to Jewish issues. 
Assisted in facilitation of interviews for the documentaries produced to highlight evidences of Kosovar Jewish friendship ties
Provided assistance in presenting the movie Worlds Nobleman to New York Film Festival, march- April 2009 (the film was awarded “ the best International Social Documentary”   
Provided assistance in presenting the movie Worlds Nobleman to Cannes International Film Festival May 2009
